summary.description:
Jointly integrating VCF-based variants and OWL-based biomedical ontologies in MongoDB.

association: a document store associations among DO,OMIM,GO,HP and SO.

createIndex.py: create index at MongoDB.

importmongodb.py: import vcf(*.json) to Mongodb.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'OWL-based', 'VCF-based', 'MongoDB', 'OWL'
